20th week  At two-thirds of the distance between the  
  symphysis pubis and umbilicus
24th week  At the level of the umbilicus
28th week  At lower one- third of the distance between the  
  umbilicus and xiphisternum
32nd week  At two-thirds of the distance between the  
  umbilicus and xiphisternum
36th week  At the level of the xiphisternum
40th week  Sinks back to the level of the 32nd week. but the
